Noteworthy: First came to power under unconstitutional or questionable circumstances,Changed constitutional term limits for own benefit

Name: Mswati III

Noteworthy: Close family member has occupied same or higher office
Notes: An absolute monarchy, the Eswatini King has absolute executive and legislative power under the constitution. He himself is not beholden to any of the limits the constitution sets out for the state in respect to its citizens and he reigns until death or the appintment of a successor.
